text: USA men's basketball survived its biggest test of the 2024 Paris Olympics by rallying to defeat Serbia 95-91 in the semifinals, clinching a spot against host nation France in the gold medal game.
speaker: SPEAKER_02

text: The U.S.
speaker: SPEAKER_02

text: trailed by as many as 17 and was down 13 heading into the fourth quarter thanks to some electric shooting from Serbia.
speaker: SPEAKER_02

text: But the star-studded quartet of LeBron James, Steph Curry, Kevin Durant, and Joel Embiid, with eight NBA MVPs between them, powered a furious fourth-quarter comeback.
speaker: SPEAKER_02

text: Embiid won the individual battle with front-court rival and three-time NBA MVP Nikola Jokic with 19 points, four rebounds, two assists.
speaker: SPEAKER_02

text: and a crucial block late in the fourth quarter in one of his best Olympic performances.
speaker: SPEAKER_02

text: Curry emerged from an Olympic debut that had been quiet thus far to lead all scorers with 36 points on 12-of-19 shooting and went 9-of-14 from his trademark three-point range.

text: Wow, really?
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: Yeah, I've had some people say, well, you didn't go to trial.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: And I said, look, if I went to battle before, you know, we couldn't wait to go to trial.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: And that's one of the reasons they withdrew.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: They tried to make a deal with us to leave President Trump and Rudy Giuliani on the hook.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: And Leah and I negotiated.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: It wasn't a negotiation.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: We said, no, we're not going to do that.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: We can't wait to go to trial.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: and show that you did every single thing we said you did.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: So they withdrew.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: And we have over 56 other cases in various stages in the state of Pennsylvania and now the federal court where we've asked for recounts and been rejected.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: We've asked for a number of matters of transparency, public records, which they've refused.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: So the most important case here that we can talk about is the federal case
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: And what we determined over the last three years and took some doing was they don't certify the machines.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: This is Hart InterCivic.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: The CEO was just indicted for bribing Filipinos.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: He's from Venezuela.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: We use smart machines.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: Part smart inter-civic or smartmatic machines here.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: That's what we have in the state of Delaware as well, smartmatic, correct.
speaker: SPEAKER_06

text: The CEO was indicted yesterday for bribing officials in the Philippines to use his machines.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: They're the same machines that we used in Venezuela that just put Madero.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: So what we've proven is – I'm sorry, Commander.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: It took us three years, but we proved that the machines, they don't certify them.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: They don't validate the software.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: They don't do logic and accuracy testing in accordance with federal law.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: And we just submitted, we went back and forth the last couple of months, but we just submitted what they call a motion for judgment on the pleadings in favor of the plaintiffs, us.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: And what we've said is you can't use the machines.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: We're going to have to go back to the precincts, hand counting, and that's the only option.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: We're going to have 3,000 people watch over the election instead of, you know, three or four people who are corrupt and we've proven are corrupt.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: Is the U.N.

text: going to be involved, Commander?
speaker: SPEAKER_06

text: Is the U.N.
speaker: SPEAKER_06

text: going to be involved in monitoring your election in Pennsylvania?

text: I don't know.

text: I don't recognize the U.N.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: To my knowledge, they don't have any authority here, and that's not going to work real well for me.

text: We always hear about the crime, but it's the cover-up, Commander.

text: You and Ms.

speaker: SPEAKER_11

speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: It's a matter of public record that the elections were stolen.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: They don't want to admit that.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: Why?
speaker: SPEAKER_11

speaker: SPEAKER_11

speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: stealing the elections, and what are you doing about it?

text: And he said his quote was, it's too radioactive to touch until after this upcoming election.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: Really?

text: So we finally got a response, even though it was through the news.
speaker: SPEAKER_11

text: But we have submitted criminal charges, and they have to be investigated.
speaker: SPEAKER_11
